newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Swire Props to sell Island Place units.
newsitem.headline: Swire Props to sell Island Place units.

text.p: Swire Properties Ltd, a unit of Swire Pacific Ltd, said on Thursday it would sell by ballot 48 residential units at its Island Place development in North Point on Hong Kong island.
The third phase of sales includes 48 units comprising four floors of Two Island Place and two floors from Three Island Place, the announcement said.
The units range in size from 672 to 996 square feet and are being offered at an average price of HK$6,438 per square foot.
Ballot registration will take place November 4-6 with results of the ballot to be announced November 7, followed by flat selection on November 8, the company said.
